SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CoreResponseCode] ( [CoreResponseCode_Ky] smallint NOT NULL , [CoreResponseCode_Title] varchar(100) NULL , [CoreResponseCode_UserInsert] int NULL , [CoreResponseCode_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CoreResponseCode_UserDelete] int NULL , [CoreResponseCode_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CoreResponseCode_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CoreResponseCode_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CoreResponseCode] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CoreResponseCode PRIMARY KEY ([CoreResponseCode_Ky])
